## Protocol.Input.EmulateTouchFromMouseEventRequest.modifiers property

Bit field representing pressed modifier keys. Alt=1, Ctrl=2, Meta/Command=4, Shift=8 (default: 0).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
modifiers?: integer;
```
